text: I (vspomnite), kogda Allakh skazal: "O Isa! YA Sam poshlyu tebe upokoyen'ye, Potom zhe voznesu k Sebe, Osvobozhu ot (bogokhul'stv) nevernykh, A tekh, kto sleduyet tebe, Prevoznesu nad temi, kto v neverii ostalsya, Do Voskreseniya (na Sud), Kogda vy vse ko Mne vernetes' I YA mezh vami rassuzhu, O chem vy (v zhizni blizhney) raskhodilis'
